SEARCH
Package com.dhk.io

Class SettingsManager

java.lang.Object
com.dhk.io.SettingsManager
public class SettingsManager extends Object
This class saves the application settings in an ini file. It enables the saving of the active number of slots, the theme state, the run on startup state, the display modes, the display scales, and the hot keys.
Version:
1.2.1
Author:
Jonathan Miller
License:
The MIT License
Copyright:
Jonathan Miller 2024
